verses.name: Psalms 50:6
verses.text: And the heavens shall declare his righteousness: for God is judge himself. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 50:7
verses.text: Hear, O my people, and I will speak; O Israel, and I will testify against thee: I am God, even thy God.

verses.name: Psalms 50:8
verses.text: I will not reprove thee for thy sacrifices or thy burnt offerings, to have been continually before me.

verses.name: Psalms 50:9
verses.text: I will take no bullock out of thy house, nor he goats out of thy folds.

verses.name: Psalms 50:10
verses.text: For every beast of the forest is mine, and the cattle upon a thousand hills.
